tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited SR Dental for wisdom tooth extraction. Dr Nidhi Bansal was extremely sweet and kind, she guided my through the process of the extraction. They had called a Surgeon to do it. The surgeon was also very nice, he made me comfortable and explained each and every step before the extraction. To my surprise, the extraction was quick and painless. Dr. Nidhi also checked with me about how I was feeling the next day, which actually made me feel really special. Thank you to the Doctors and the support team 😊
reply_text:
Thank you for your kind words mam
We at S R Dental work hard to make your treatment painless and your appointment seamless
I m glad that you appreciated this
Regards
S R Dental

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very professional, courteous and friendly all throughout the treatment. Elaborated my issues really well and dealt with them patiently. Was aware of the issues that may crop up during the treatment and took adequate precautions and measures to deal with them, while keeping me updated on it. Treatment was provided on time for all sittings, appreciate the punctuality, given during COVID there are additional precautions that are to be taken; which were really well done at the clinic. Took good care to avoid discomfort during the treatment and was fully cognisant of the manner of diagnosis which was all encompassing & comprehensive. Would definitely recommend Dr. Nidhi for RCTs.
reply_text:
Thank u sir
Your appreciation is our motivation
Regards

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: The advice given by the doctor is really commendable and the treatment plan given by the doctor was very good.
reply_text:
Thank you for your appreciation.
This boosts our confidence and motivates us to do better each day.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: A good dentist will never be in a rush to provide treatments such as wisdom teeth removal in Blacktown for their patients. They will take the time to listen to their patients’ concerns, especially when dealing with children or senior citizens. Even if a patient asks too many questions about their condition, the dentist will be patient enough in answering everything. They will have a polite attitude, and treat all patients equally.

Your appreciation is our motivation
